CustomField.description: Identifies if any Questions in Q1-6 are Red
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Q01_Estimated_Annual_Contract_Value__c, "More than Â£3m"), ISPICKVAL(Q01_Estimated_Annual_Contract_Value__c, "Unknown (Framework or similar)"), ISPICKVAL(Q02_Framework_Master_Service_Agreement__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Q03_Public_Contract_Utilities_Contract__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Q04_Construction_or_Project__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Q05_PFI_or_LIFT__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL(Q06_New_Business_Activity_or_New_Sector__c, "Yes") )
CustomField.label: Q1 to 6 - Red
